programs.name: Singapore Airlines KrisFlyer
programs.summary: Unlock Singapore Airlines' world-class cabins and a deep partner network with region-based award charts and reasonable surcharges.
programs.seoDescription: Master the Singapore KrisFlyer program with transfer partners, saver award strategies, and elite tier shortcuts for premium cabin travel.
eliteLevels: Elite Silver begins at 25,000 elite miles and grants priority waitlisting and complimentary seat selection
Elite Gold at 50,000 miles unlocks Star Alliance Gold status with lounge access worldwide
sweetSpots: Book Singapore Suites from New York to Frankfurt for 97,000 miles with saver availability
Intra-Asia business class flights start at just 21,500 miles one-way
Spontaneous Escapes promotions discount select routes by 30% every month

programs.name: Avios (British Airways, Qatar Airways, Iberia)
programs.hub: Multiple hubs including London-Heathrow and Doha
programs.summary: Distance-based pricing makes Avios perfect for short-haul flights and for leveraging Qatar’s premium cabins when booked through partner portals.
programs.seoDescription: Learn how to pool, transfer, and redeem Avios across partner airlines for incredible short-haul and Qsuite awards.
eliteLevels: Tier Points earned on cash tickets unlock Bronze, Silver, and Gold status within the British Airways Executive Club
Qatar Airways Privilege Club members enjoy Qsuite award availability releases for elite members
sweetSpots: 4,000 Avios + low fees for economy flights under 650 miles in Europe
Use 70,000 Avios for Qatar Qsuite from the U.S. to the Middle East
Transfer Avios between British Airways, Iberia, Aer Lingus, and Qatar to access different award charts

programs.name: Air India Flying Returns (Maharajah Club)
programs.summary: India’s flag carrier program offers competitive redemption rates on Air India metal and Star Alliance partners with generous stopover rules.
programs.seoDescription: See why Air India Flying Returns—also known as the Maharajah Club—deserves attention for Star Alliance awards to and from the Indian subcontinent.
eliteLevels: Silver Edge Club at 25,000 status points grants 15% bonus miles and priority services
Golden Edge Club at 50,000 points delivers Star Alliance Gold benefits including lounge access
The Maharajah Club at 75,000 points unlocks upgrade vouchers and dedicated support
sweetSpots: Round-trip business class between India and Europe for 90,000 miles
Stopover permitted on international itineraries without extra miles
Attractive surcharges compared to booking via other Star Alliance partners

programs.name: Air Canada Aeroplan
programs.summary: Aeroplan’s hybrid award chart and dozens of non-alliance partners create outsized value with low surcharges and generous routing rules.
programs.seoDescription: Dive into Air Canada Aeroplan sweet spots, stopover policies, and partner list to stretch your transferable points further.
eliteLevels: 25K status includes two Maple Leaf Lounge passes and eUpgrades
Super Elite 100K offers priority awards, concierge service, and unlimited Maple Leaf Lounge access
sweetSpots: Add a stopover on a one-way award for just 5,000 extra points
Fly ANA first class from the U.S. to Tokyo for 110,000 points
Use Family Sharing to combine points across household accounts

awardPlaybook.title: Search partners, not airlines
awardPlaybook.detail: Use Air Canada Aeroplan, Avianca LifeMiles, or Virgin Atlantic to book seats on Star Alliance and SkyTeam partners with fewer surcharges.

awardPlaybook.title: Leverage stopovers
awardPlaybook.detail: Programs like Aeroplan and Alaska Mileage Plan allow stopovers on one-way awards—turn a connection into a mini vacation.

awardPlaybook.title: Watch transfer bonuses
awardPlaybook.detail: Amex, Chase, and Capital One regularly offer 15–30% bonuses. Transfer only when a specific award is available.

favoriteRoutes.highlight: Redeem 50k points for one-way Delta One to Europe during off-peak dates.
Fly Japan Airlines business class for 60k miles with a free stopover in Tokyo.
Short-haul flights start at 4k points and avoid high fuel surcharges when booked through Iberia.
